t: Amazon.com: GREENSHIELD ORGANIC Organic Automatic Dish Detergent, 32 FZ : Health & Household
s: As far as cleaning goes, this Greenshield soap worked fine, and did not leave white residue on the dishes. It is not magic and does not remove stuck on food, however for normal cleaning there are no complaints. However, I will not buy this again until an unscented version is available. The smell during the dishwashing cycle is overpoweringly strong. The Better Life brand Automatic Magic product is unscented and works fine. FIT Organics ...
